title: Creative Dance Education Course Utilizing WSQ-Based Flipped Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Comprehension of core concepts and intermediate-level application skills
context.additional_context: Non-Degree Program for Professionals in Medical/Legal/Technical Fields to Alleviate Work-Related Stress and Enhance Creative Expression

learning_goals: Master basic dance movements by improving technical errors by over 30% through WSQ (Watch-Study-Question) activities within 12 weeks
Learners design and present two creative dance sequences through peer evaluation in Week 4
Learners achieve an 80%+ feedback implementation rate by writing self-reflection journals at least once weekly in a flipped learning environment

resources: BYOD (Bring Your Own Device) device management system

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
